docs.text: About Javier Iparraguirre is an engineer, educator, researcher, and team builder. He received the PhD in Engineering degree from Universidad Nacional del Sur , the MS in Computer Science degree from University of Illinois at Chicago , and the BS in Electrical Engineering degree from Universidad Nacional del Sur. He was awarded with the Master’s Scholarship from Fulbright Commission . At present, he integrates the Data Science team at Teladoc Health . Since 2009, he teaches and does research in the Electronics Engineering department at Universidad Tecnológica Nacional, Bahía Blanca, Argentina . His focus areas are Machine Learning, Computer Vision, and High Performance Computing. He published a book and multiple articles in journals and international conferences.

docs.text: Publications A list of my publications is available at Google Scholar . Book Title: Making Computing More Efficient Based on New Hardware Architectures: A Multi-core Processing Approach . Author: Javier Iparraguirre. Publisher: VDM Verlag Dr. Müller. June, 2010. You can buy it at amazon.com .
